tool_description: Generates automated alerts for products with stock levels below defined thresholds, supporting multiple alert priorities and delivery methods.

product_filters.description: Product IDs or category IDs to monitor

alert_threshold.description: Stock level below which to trigger alerts

priority_level.description: Alert priority: low, medium, high, critical

suppress_duplicates_hours.description: Hours to suppress duplicate alerts for same product

error_messages: Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid alert channel: Supported channels are [email, sms, slack, webhook].
Filter limit exceeded: Maximum 200 product/category filters allowed.
Invalid threshold: Alert threshold must be a positive integer.
Suppression period invalid: Duplicate suppression must be between 1 and 168 hours.
usage: Specify product_filters and alert_threshold to monitor stock levels. Set priority_level and alert_channels for delivery preferences. Use suppress_duplicates_hours to control alert frequency.

delivery_status.description: Status of alert delivery (sent, pending, failed)
